title: help
body: ok, so i have done this before, i even submitted a ticket to recover my account, yes the password was randomly changed, i dont change my passwords, i keep the same but change numbers in it, i know what passwords belongs to what, but, as i said my password has been changed, i submitted a ticket, and i gave all the info regarding all the ip addresses the account was played on, the credt card numbers that went through the account, i gave the last 3 pre-paid redeem rp card numbers(the ones from the store) the year and month the account was made, first 5 perchust champs with rp, city country it was made in and all cities the account was played in, but riot denied my ticket because i couldnt say what my first 3 refunds went on.... is there anything else that i can do and no i dont have the email address that is link to that account

replies.body:
Other than continuing to work with the account recovery specialist you've been assigned, there's nothing else that can be done to recover the account. I recommend providing the information the specialist has requested so we can get the account back to you.

Let me know if you have any questions.

also, never mind the ip addresses i played the account at, the city and country it was made, the cities it been payed in, my last 5 champs brought, including skins,, all this information i have said, he requested and i answerd with the best of my knowledge

did you not read my post, i provided all information this guy requested, al was correct besides the first 3 refunds i ever done, but because of that 1 wrong answer, i dont get it, never mind the debit card numbers, never mind the pre-paid card numbers, never mind the first 5 champs brought with rp, this is bullshit, iv had that account since late 2009, if i wanted to get rid of it i would have sold it for the $400 i was offered
